content_descriptors.notes: There is a little bit of blood in some places of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core I3
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Dell Creative Sound Blaster Live - Sound card - 5.1
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Cor I5 9th Gen
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Asus Xonar D1/A Sound Card
